interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Star Trek: The Next Generation: Season 5
Review Date: 2015/05/12
Store: Patrick Stewart  (Actor),     Jonathan Frakes  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
Product Description: ['STAR TREK: THE NEXT GENERATION SEASON FIVE never looked more stunning than it does on Blu-ray with 1080p high definition picture. Experience enhanced visual effects rebuilt from the original elements and surround yourself with the digitally remastered 7.1 sound (or choose the original broadcast audio). You\'ll feel like you\'re plunged into the 24th century for some of the series\' most thrilling moments, including the epic two-part episode "Unification" as Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) pursues a rogue Ambassador Spock (Leonard Nimoy) into enemy Romulan territory. Discover all-new, never-before-seen bonus features as you join the USS Enterprise on the ultimate voyage.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television', 'Format': 'Box set, Full Screen, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Jonathan Frakes, Patrick Stewart, Brent Spiner', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28121246', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Full Screen, Subtitled', 'Run time': '19 hours and 42 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 19, 2016', 'Actors': 'Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner', 'Subtitles': 'French, English', 'Studio': 'PARAMOUNT', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: t's incredible to see these in HD for the first time.  I have the entire series and going through it in HD was like watching it all again for the first time.  The quality is incredible.  I definitely recommend these and watching the whole series again on Blu Ray!
Review Title: I have the entire series and going through it in HD was like watching it all again for the first time
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Klein', 'Phil Churchward', 'Nigel Simpkiss', 'Richard Heeley', 'James Bryce', 'Andrew Fettis', 'Owen Trevor', 'Mark McQueen', 'Jon Richards', 'Konrad Begg'], 'Producers': ['Andy Wilman'], 'Starring': ['Jeremy Clarkson', 'Richard Hammond', 'James May'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} I really enjoy this program. As always, the quality and speed from Amazon is awesome. If you're a top gear fan, this is a must see! This particular episode was hilarious. Great program {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Scanlon'], 'Producers': ['Kori Rae'], 'Starring': ['Billy Crystal', 'John Goodman', 'Steve Buscemi'], 'Studio': ['Pixar']} It was good, not as good as the first Monsters Inc., movie, but good. The movie is entirely placed when the monsters were in school. The quality is awesome and it's worth watching, but be prepared for an understated plot. I would like to have seen more ties to their work after school and getting hired. This flew by in about a 30 second window in this movie. Not as good as the first one... {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Matthew Vaughn'], 'Producers': ['Stephen Marks', 'Peter Morton', 'David Womark', 'Matthew Vaughn', 'Lorenzo Di Bonaventura', 'Michael Dreyer', 'Neil Gaiman'], 'Starring': ['Claire Danes', 'Charlie Cox', 'Sienna Miller']} I enjoyed the setting and plot of this movie. Of course, in the end, we knew the hero would make it. There were some other surprising plot twists that I hadn't expected. It was an enjoyable find.

If you like movies that contain magic, witches, and some humor, you will probably enjoy this movie. Surprisingly good find.... profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to demonstrate a strong preference for high-definition releases of animated and engaging programming that blends humor with imaginative storytelling. Their appreciation for nostalgic series is reaffirmed through recent acquisitions, showcasing their commitment to quality visuals and memorable viewing experiences.

- **Genre Inclination:** They are consistently drawn to the adventure, fantasy, and science fiction genres, valuing captivating narratives that intertwine humor with thematic richness.

- **Quality Appreciation:** Recent interactions emphasize a discerning taste for well-produced content, particularly in high-definition formats. The user's enthusiasm for enhanced visuals and sound reinforces their commitment to superior production standards.

- **Rating Trend:** With a consistent average rating of 4.8, the user favors content that artfully balances humor and storytelling, while also celebrating their favorite series' nostalgia.

- **Language and Accessibility:** An ongoing preference for English-language media, alongside a focus on content with multiple subtitle options, underscores the user's commitment to broader accessibility.

- **Content Advisory Awareness:** They remain conscientious about content advisory labels, reflecting a responsible media consumption approach, especially concerning themes of violence and language.

Overall, the user seeks high-quality, entertaining shows and films that blend humor with adventure and fantasy elements, reflecting their discerning taste for impressive production quality and enriching narratives. They are likely to revisit and recommend series that meet these criteria.
